name: Tales of Inca 2 - New Adventures
description:
A new, great adventure awaits the people of the Incas! The merciless god of the underworld transforms their paradisiacal landscape and home into scorched and fire-breathing earth. The brave Incas can save themselves, but what now?

Join the Incas on their exciting journey, fight against demons and mystical monsters and experience exciting adventures!

Many landscapes and territories want to be explored to save the home of the Incas. Until then there are a lot of exciting levels ahead of them!

Features:

- New adventures and many exciting levels
- Mode without time limit
- Gods and mystical opponents
- Trophies and awards
- Challenging, entertaining game fun
